016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jetty.server;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.keystores.KeyStores;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.keystores.KeyStoresConfiguration;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.secrets.Secrets;
022import jakarta.inject.Inject;
023import jakarta.inject.Named;
024import jakarta.inject.Singleton;
025import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
026import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
027import org.eclipse.jetty.util.ssl.SslContextFactory;
028import org.glassfish.hk2.api.Factory;
029import org.glassfish.hk2.api.PreDestroy;
030import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
031
032import javax.security.auth.x500.X500Principal;
033import java.io.InputStream;
034import java.security.cert.CRL;
035import java.security.cert.CertificateFactory;
036import java.security.cert.X509CRL;
037import java.util.*;
038import java.util.stream.Collectors;
039
040@Service(name = "jetty.server.ssl")
041public class ServerSslContextFactoryFactory
042        implements Factory<SslContextFactory.Server>, PreDestroy {
043
044    private final Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(getClass());
045
046    private final SslContextFactory.Server factory;
047
048    @Inject
049    public ServerSslContextFactoryFactory(Configuration configuration, KeyStores keyStores, Secrets secrets) throws Exception {
050
051        JettyServerSslConfiguration jettyServerSslConfiguration = new JettyServerSslConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("jetty.server.ssl"));
052        KeyStoresConfiguration keyStoresConfiguration = new KeyStoresConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("keystores"));
053
054        Collection<? extends CRL> crls = jettyServerSslConfiguration.getCRLs()
055                .<Collection<? extends CRL>>map(url ->
056                {
057                    try (InputStream in = url.openStream()) {
058                        return CertificateFactory.getInstance("X.509").generateCRLs(in);
059                    } catch (Throwable throwable) {
060                        LogManager.getLogger(ServerSslContextFactoryFactory.class).error("Could not load CRLs", throwable);
061                        return Collections.emptyList();
062                    }
063                }).orElse(Collections.emptyList());
064
065        if (!crls.isEmpty()) {
066            logger.info("CRLs loaded:\n" + crls.stream()
067                    .map(X509CRL.class::cast)
068                    .map(X509CRL::getIssuerX500Principal)
069                    .map(X500Principal::getName)
070                    .collect(Collectors.joining("\n")));
071
072            Date now = new Date();
073            crls.stream().map(X509CRL.class::cast).forEach(crl ->
074            {
075                if (crl.getNextUpdate().before(now))
076                    logger.warn("CRL has expired:" + crl.getIssuerX500Principal().getName());
077            });
078        }
079
080        factory = new CustomSslContextFactoryServer(crls);
081        jettyServerSslConfiguration.getKeyStoreName().ifPresentOrElse(name ->
082        {
083            factory.setKeyStore(keyStores.getKeyStore(name));
084            factory.setKeyManagerPassword(keyStoresConfiguration.getKeyStoreConfiguration(name).getPassword().map(secrets::getSecretString).orElse(null));
085            factory.setCertAlias(jettyServerSslConfiguration.getAlias());
086        }, ()->
087        {
088            logger.warn("SSL enabled but no keystore specified");
089        });
090        jettyServerSslConfiguration.getTrustStoreName().ifPresent(name ->
091        {
092            factory.setTrustStore(keyStores.getKeyStore(name));
093        });
094
095        factory.setHostnameVerifier((hostName, session) -> true);
096        factory.setTrustAll(jettyServerSslConfiguration.isTrustAll());
097        factory.setNeedClientAuth(jettyServerSslConfiguration.isNeedClientAuth());
098        factory.setWantClientAuth(jettyServerSslConfiguration.isWantClientAuth());
099        factory.start();
100    }
101
102    @Override
103    public void preDestroy() {
104        try {
105            factory.stop();
106        } catch (Exception e) {
107            LogManager.getLogger(getClass()).error("Could not stop SSL context factory", e);
108        }
109    }
110
111    @Singleton
112    @Named("jetty.server.ssl")
113    @Override
114    public SslContextFactory.Server provide() {
115        return factory;
116    }
117
118    @Override
119    public void dispose(SslContextFactory.Server instance) {
120    }
121}
